title: Jhin Q proc'ing Karma Q sound effect.
body:
I noticed this a week ago and it happened again today, I'm not sure if others can hear it but when Jhin throws his Q instead of the normal sound its just 4 "Karma" q sound effects if the q's were to hit.

Also this only seems to happen when I am laning with or against a Karma.

replies.body:
Hiya iArbitrator! 

Thanks for the report! This is a case of audio theft. :c We're aware of the issue and are looking into it! ^-^
